Author: TheArcane43
Name: Substat Tiers
Description: Gives a detailed table of how your substats work. Includes substat tiering, substat effects, potential tier gains on materia, and estimated damage amounts.
Punchline: Show how substats tier and what effects you get from them.
Changelog:
Changes from 0.5.0.1:

 - More coming soon!
